short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export dependent picklist values from Salesforce.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly streamline your Salesforce workflows with the Salesforce Picklist Exporter extension. Designed for Salesforce administrators and developers, this tool simplifies the export of dependent picklist values directly into a CSV file.

Key Features:

Seamless Integration: Automatically detects dependent picklist values within Salesforce.

Easy Export: Export only visible picklist values or view all and export them at once.

User-Friendly Interface: Simple button addition and tooltip instructions ensure anyone can use it without hassle.

Accessibility: Designed with accessibility in mind, featuring clear tooltips and labels.

Take control of your Salesforce data and make exporting a breeze. Install Salesforce Picklist Exporter today and boost your productivity! ðŸš€
